column7: Individualized instruction in musical expression, language, performance practice, recital, or other specialized repertoire for advanced vocal students by coaching and accompanying faculty. 1 to 2 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. May be repeated in separate semesters for 4 hours, if topics vary, to a total maximum of 12 hours. Prerequisite: Permission of instructor.
